files.name: index.js
pagination-content.svelte
pagination-ellipsis.svelte
files.content: More pages

files.name: pagination-item.svelte
pagination-link.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { Pagination as PaginationPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
	import { buttonVariants } from "$lib/registry/default/ui/button/index.js";
	let className = undefined;
	export let page;
	export let size = "icon";
	export let isActive = false;
	export { className as class };
</script>

<PaginationPrimitive.Page
	bind:page
	class={cn(
		buttonVariants({
			variant: isActive ? "outline" : "ghost",
			size,
		}),
		className
	)}
	{...$$restProps}
	on:click
>
	<slot>{page.value}</slot>
</PaginationPrimitive.Page>

files.name: pagination-next-button.svelte
pagination-prev-button.svelte
pagination.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { Pagination as PaginationPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
	let className = undefined;
	export let count = 0;
	export let perPage = 10;
	export let page = 1;
	export let siblingCount = 1;
	export { className as class };
	$: currentPage = page;
</script>

<PaginationPrimitive.Root
	{count}
	{perPage}
	{siblingCount}
	bind:page
	let:builder
	let:pages
	let:range
	asChild
	{...$$restProps}
>
	<nav {...builder} class={cn("mx-auto flex w-full flex-col items-center", className)}>
		<slot {pages} {range} {currentPage} />
	</nav>
</PaginationPrimitive.Root>
